title: 14 minute queue wait for 1 leave

replies.body: Looking into your account, I wasn't able to find anything regarding Leaverbuster.  It looks like you account obtained a lower priority queue through a[ queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), which will give you a one-game timer based your dodges.  Be sure to play your games consistently without dodging, and you won't experience an extended timer.  Regarding your black screen, this is usually a network issue connecting to the server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Hope that helps!
